creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
inscription: LL: 大正十四年五月作 {Taishō jūyonen gogatsu saku}; BC: 双作版画會　伊せ辰 {Sōsaku hangakai Isetatsu}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper with mica
text: Shinsui rarely worked for publishers other than Watanabe Sho_zaburo_. However, during a short intermezzo from 1925 until 1927, he designed five beauty prints for Iseya Tatsugoro_, smaller than those Watanabe published.
title: Intermission
